Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Innside Düsseldorf Seestern in Duesseldorf (Loerick), you'll be convenient to Congress Centre Duesseldorf and Museum Kunstpalast. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Messe Duesseldorf and Freizeitpark Heerdt.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 126 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Partially open bathrooms with separate bathtubs and showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and desks, and you can also request irons/ironing boards.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Don’t miss out on recreational opportunities including a sauna and a fitness center. Additional amenities include wireless Internet access (surcharge) and concierge services.

Dining
Grab a bite at one of the hotel's 1 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, express check-in, and express check-out. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
Grab a bite at one of the hotel's 1 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at Innside Düsseldorf Seestern in Duesseldorf (Loerick), you'll be convenient to Congress Centre Duesseldorf and Museum Kunstpalast. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Messe Duesseldorf and Freizeitpark Heerdt.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Congress Centre Duesseldorf - 2 km / 1.3 mi
Messe Duesseldorf - 2 km / 1.3 mi
Freizeitpark Heerdt - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Esprit Arena - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi
Rheinwiesen - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
Museum Kunstpalast - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi
Tonhalle Duesseldorf - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi
Duesseldorf Art Academy - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
St Lambertus Church - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
Old Castle Tower - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
Rhine Promenade - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
Duesseldorf City Hall - 3 km / 1.9 mi
Harbor Bridge - 3 km / 1.9 mi
Marktplatz - 3 km / 1.9 mi
Film Museum - 3.1 km / 1.9 mi

The preferred airport for Innside Düsseldorf Seestern is Duesseldorf (DUS-Duesseldorf Intl.) - 5.1 km / 3.2 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
